title: Rengar is severely UP
body:
Alright, let's talk about his passive first, firstly, the fact that he can only leap out of a bush at a target, like, not just leap over terrain from a bush or anything, he NEEDS to leap onto a target, which is stupid since he's ALREADY immobile, and even when chasing, the enemy can avoid bushes, or place traps (like Teemo mushrooms) into the bushes to slow down the Rengar, which makes you extremely predictable while playing him.

His ferocity gimmick is nice, but the fact that he just loses it if the enemy simply walks away from him is... weak, building it is hard since your abilities would most likely already be on cooldown after you built it.

His bonetooth necklace is, well, decent but Rengar has really weak ganks (especially pre-6) so it will take a while to build it. (You have an excuse to scream at your team for kill stealing though)

**Q:** Not bad, I can't say something negative except from the fact that a steroid is the last thing Rengar needs.

**W:** Is he a diver or a slayer? That's what Riot need to decide, some wise person once said "prevention is better than cure" and guess what? I'd rather be able to leap out of that Ziggs' ultimate and take no damage rather than healing 50% later...

**E:** So, once that Blitzcrank calmly walks away from you, you decide that the only thing you can do is throw a bola at him, its ferocity effect is neat, but again, you'd most likely use it to build said ferocity.

**R:** Should say "Rengar tells the entire enemy team he's coming, they group up and you can't kill anything" oh and guess what? If you do, you'll probably die next unless you can outwalk the enemy, but I doubt you can. Honestly though, even Jinx has a better way to get out after a kill.

And guess what? Assassins are meant to be squishy but compensate that with 1) Dealing a lot of damage
~~2) High mobility~~ crossed out because it's something Rengar doesn't have anywhere except his dreams. 

This is what I propose: (implement 2 of these changes)

1) Can leap anywhere while being in bushes
2) Doesn't need to be in bushes to leap
3) Rework his W and Q
4) No one except Rengar and his team knows when he ults
5) Make his W into a dash of some sort
6) His W now also grants him health and protections
7) His E  **always** roots

I see what you're saying, but all I'm getting is "Rengar's intended weaknesses shouldn't be there". Champions shouldn't be dumbed down like that. It makes them way too easy to play and they invariably end up being the weakest champions, power and experience. As for that feeling of "oh shit", I challenge you to find someone who hasn't gotten away with half health from a fight and when that Rengar symbol appears over there head and they hear the noise from his ult, HASN'T shit themselves. 

Believe it or not, if Rengar's ult didn't alert you, it would take away the feeling of dread somebody feels just from being allowed to fear for their lives for a second. Imagine if there was no indication and suddenly you were just dead. This was what made old Rengar one of the most hated champions in league. He's fine the way he is right now

Also, on topic... I don't think it's so much of a Rengar being UP, rather than the fact that Kha'zix is just a superior version of him at any stage when compared as Assassins...

Rengar just feels like Riot tried really hard (almost too hard) to make him a Assassin that fights like a Bruiser... which was ofc doomed to fail...
Anyways, playing against a fed Rengar is still a hellish experience if you're the ADC in low and mid elos...
